Mangold will direct Captain Nemo

James Mangold, director of The Wolverine , will helm Disney’s Captain Nemo , an ‘origin story’ about the heroic protagonist of author Jules Verne’s novel 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea .

Writer-director Sebastian Gutierrez is working on the latest draft of the film. However, the origin story of Captain Nemo is not a straight adaptation of the novel. — IANS
title: The Wolverine director to helm Captain Nemo
